articles.description: The former India batsman gives his unique insight into the technique and mindset required for success on turning pitches
articles.content: One of the great sights in cricket was to see Shane Warne in his follow through with his hands on his hips, shaking his head in disbelief. Two identically pitched deliveries had just gone for four. T… [+5921 chars]
